humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides a tumor size of 2.1 x 1 x 1.5 cm. According to the rules, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, the tumor size is described as 'Tumour sized 2.1 x 1 x 1.5 cm'. The T stage for a tumor of this size, according to the TNM staging system, is T2.
